channel.title: native on Silviu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in native on Silviu's Blog

item.title: Iâ€™m not using Gravity for Twitter access on my phone
item.description: Even though I like Gravity a lot, I chose a simpler FREEWARE symbian native application as a client for Twitter - Tweets60: It’s simple, fast, and has access point prioritization built in. It may not be as feature full as Gravity, but it’s free - so you can’t argue there. You can write your tweets, follow others and click links and more. Even more I find it faster than Gravity. Of course if you need or want to be able to upload pictures and other advanced features that Tweet60 misses for now you’ll need to shell out the (modest) price of Gravity.
